statements: SELECT * FROM leadership_surveys;
SELECT employee_name, department, survey_date FROM leadership_surveys WHERE leadership_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM leadership_surveys WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, leadership_rating FROM leadership_surveys ORDER BY leadership_rating DESC;
SELECT survey_id, employee_name, department, survey_date FROM leadership_surveys WHERE leadership_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM leadership_surveys WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, leadership_rating FROM leadership_surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY leadership_rating DESC;
SELECT survey_id, employee_name, department, survey_date, feedback FROM leadership_surveys WHERE leadership_rating >= 4 ORDER BY department ASC, survey_date DESC;
SELECT department, COUNT(survey_id) AS total_surveys FROM leadership_surveys GROUP BY department HAVING COUNT(survey_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_surveys DESC;
SELECT AVG(leadership_rating) AS avg_rating, department FROM leadership_surveys GROUP BY department HAVING AVG(leadership_rating) > 3 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM leadership_surveys;
SELECT user_id, survey_id, question FROM leadership_surveys WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT question, answer FROM leadership_surveys WHERE survey_id = 100 ORDER BY question DESC;
SELECT user_id, survey_id, question, answer FROM leadership_surveys WHERE user_id = 2 AND survey_id = 200;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, user_id;
SELECT user_id, survey_id, question, answer FROM leadership_surveys WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(survey_id) AS survey_count FROM leadership_surveys GROUP BY user_id HAVING survey_count >= 3;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, question, answer FROM leadership_surveys WHERE question LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING average_rating >= 3.5;
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Surveys;
SELECT survey_name, question1, question2 FROM Leadership_Surveys;
SELECT participant_id, name, department FROM Participants WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT survey_id, feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(*) as total_responses FROM Leadership_Surveys GROUP BY survey_name;
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Surveys WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT survey_name, question1 FROM Leadership_Surveys WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT p.name, p.department, f.feedback_text, f.rating FROM Participants p INNER JOIN Feedback f ON p.participant_id = f.participant_id WHERE f.rating > 3 ORDER BY p.name ASC
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM Leadership_Surveys LEFT JOIN Feedback ON Leadership_Surveys.survey_id = Feedback.survey_id GROUP BY survey_name HAVING total_feedback > 10

SELECT survey_name, department, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM Leadership_Surveys LEFT JOIN Participants ON Leadership_Surveys.participant_id = Participants.participant_id GROUP BY survey_name, department ORDER BY total_participants DESC
SELECT * FROM leadership_surveys;
SELECT leader_name, survey_question FROM leadership_surveys ORDER BY leader_name;
SELECT employee_name, survey_response FROM leadership_surveys WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT submitted_by, submitted_on FROM feedback_comments WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT employee_name, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE submitted_on > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY submitted_on DESC;
SELECT * FROM leadership_surveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT leader_name, employee_name, survey_question FROM leadership_surveys WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, SUM(overall_score) AS total_overall_score FROM survey_scores GROUP BY survey_id HAVING total_overall_score > 20;
SELECT employee_name, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 3 AND submitted_on BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT feedback_id, comment, submitted_by, submitted_on FROM feedback_comments WHERE submitted_on >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY submitted_on DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_department ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_type, feedback_date FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_type = 'Positive';
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%Engineering%';
SELECT survey_id, survey_question, survey_response, survey_date FROM leadership_surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.employee_department = d.department_id;
